name: Temryava
description:
OMG! It's my first time joining a Ludum Dare jam! How amazing it feels to join a huge event that every game dev frolicks to (^^

This game is... kinda ok, I guess? I just wanted to submit something and take part in an event that was very large. So it ain't really the best, but also not the worst. Oh well...

Just hit that Play button and have fun, like always!
